MetricsPlatformEnableExperimentOverrides.description: Enable experiment enrollment overrides via a querystring parameter or a cookie.

MetricsPlatformEnableExperiments.description: If this is falsy, then all experiment-related behavior is disabled.

MetricsPlatformEnableExperimentConfigsFe.description: Enable fetching experiment configs from XLab during the request if no experiments are defined in $wgMetricsPlatformExperiments. WARNING: This will degrade performance for logged-in users.

MetricsPlatformExperimentEventIntakeServ.description: The URL of the EventGate experiment-related event intake service.

MetricsPlatformAuthPreserveQueryParamsEx.description: List of experiment names to use in the AuthPreseveQueryParams hook. For each experiment listed here, AuthPreserveQueryParams will add its assigned group to a query param in the form ?mpo=<experiment1-name:group>;<experiment2-name:group>
